fasiyHuwA@ fiY {lo>aroDi >arobaEapa >a$ohurK wa{Eolamuw^A@ >an~akumo gayoru muEojiziY {ll~ahi wa>an~a {ll~aha muxoziY {loka`firiyna

wa>a*a`nN m~ina {ll~ahi warasuwlihi.^ <ilaY {ln~aAsi yawoma {loHaj~i {lo>akobari >an~a {ll~aha bariY^'N m~ina {lomu$orikiyna warasuwluhu, fa<in tubotumo fahuwa xayorN l~akumo wa<in tawal~ayotumo fa{Eolamuw^A@ >an~akumo gayoru muEojiziY {ll~ahi waba$~iri {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ biEa*aAbK >aliymK

<il~aA {l~a*iyna Ea`hadt~um m~ina {lomu$orikiyna vum~a lamo yanquSuwkumo $ayo_#FA walamo yuZa`hiruwA@ Ealayokumo >aHadFA fa>atim~uw^A@ <ilayohimo Eahodahumo <ilaY` mud~atihimo <in~a {ll~aha yuHib~u {lomut~aqiyna

fa<i*aA {nsalaxa {lo>a$ohuru {loHurumu fa{qotuluwA@ {lomu$orikiyna Hayovu wajadt~umuwhumo waxu*uwhumo wa{HoSuruwhumo wa{qoEuduwA@ lahumo kul~a maroSadK fa<in taAbuwA@ wa>aqaAmuwA@ {lS~alaw`pa wa'aAtawuA@ {lz~akaw`pa faxal~uwA@ sabiylahumo <in~a {ll~aha gafuwrN r~aHiymN
wa<ino >aHadN m~ina {lomu$orikiyna {sotajaAraka fa>ajirohu Hat~aY` yasomaEa kala`ma {ll~ahi vum~a >aboligohu ma>omanahu, *a`lika bi>an~ahumo qawomN l~aA yaEolamuwna

kayofa yakuwnu lilomu$orikiyna EahodN Einda {ll~ahi waEinda rasuwlihi.^ <il~aA {l~a*iyna Ea`hadt~umo Einda {lomasojidi {loHaraAmi famaA {sotaqa`muwA@ lakumo fa{sotaqiymuwA@ lahumo <in~a {ll~aha yuHib~u {lomut~aqiyna
kayofa wa<in yaZoharuwA@ Ealayokumo laA yaroqubuwA@ fiykumo <il~FA walaA *im~apF yuroDuwnakum bi>afowa`hihimo wata>obaY` quluwbuhumo wa>akovaruhumo fa`siquwna
{$otarawoA@ bi_#aAya`ti {ll~ahi vamanFA qaliylFA faSad~uwA@ Ean sabiylihi.^ <in~ahumo saA^'a maA kaAnuwA@ yaEomaluwna
laA yaroqubuwna fiY mu&ominK <il~FA walaA *im~apF wa>uw@la`^}ika humu {lomuEotaduwna
fa<in taAbuwA@ wa>aqaAmuwA@ {lS~alaw`pa wa'aAtawuA@ {lz~akaw`pa fa<ixowa`nukumo fiY {ld~iyni wanufaS~ilu {lo'aAya`ti liqawomK yaEolamuwna
wa<in n~akavuw^A@ >ayoma`nahum m~in[ baEodi Eahodihimo waTaEanuwA@ fiY diynikumo faqa`tiluw^A@ >a}im~apa {lokufori <in~ahumo laA^ >ayoma`na lahumo laEal~ahumo yantahuwna
>alaA tuqa`tiluwna qawomFA n~akavuw^A@ >ayoma`nahumo waham~uwA@ bi<ixoraAji {lr~asuwli wahum bada'uwkumo >aw~ala mar~apK >ataxo$awonahumo fa{ll~ahu >aHaq~u >an taxo$awohu <in kuntum m~u&ominiyna
qa`tiluwhumo yuEa*~ibohumu {ll~ahu bi>ayodiykumo wayuxozihimo wayanSurokumo Ealayohimo waya$ofi Suduwra qawomK m~u&ominiyna
wayu*ohibo gayoZa quluwbihimo wayatuwbu {ll~ahu EalaY` man ya$aA^'u wa{ll~ahu EaliymN HakiymN

>amo Hasibotumo >an tutorakuwA@ walam~aA yaEolami {ll~ahu {l~a*iyna ja`haduwA@ minkumo walamo yat~axi*uwA@ min duwni {ll~ahi walaA rasuwlihi. walaA {lomu&ominiyna waliyjapF wa{ll~ahu xabiyrN[ bimaA taEomaluwna
maA kaAna lilomu$orikiyna >an yaEomuruwA@ masa`jida {ll~ahi $a`hidiyna EalaY`^ >anfusihim bi{lokufori >uw@la`^}ika HabiTato >aEoma`luhumo wafiY {ln~aAri humo xa`liduwna

<in~amaA yaEomuru masa`jida {ll~ahi mano 'aAmana bi{ll~ahi wa{loyawomi {lo'aAxiri wa>aqaAma {lS~alaw`pa wa'aAtaY {lz~akaw`pa walamo yaxo$a <il~aA {ll~aha faEasaY`^ >uw@la`^}ika >an yakuwnuwA@ mina {lomuhotadiyna

xa`lidiyna fiyhaA^ >abadFA <in~a {ll~aha Eindahu,^ >ajorN EaZiymN

ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ laA tat~axi*uw^A@ 'aAbaA^'akumo wa<ixowa`nakumo >awoliyaA^'a <ini {sotaHab~uwA@ {lokufora EalaY {lo<iyma`ni waman yatawal~ahum m~inkumo fa>uw@la`^}ika humu {lZ~a`limuwna

qulo <in kaAna 'aAbaA^&ukumo wa>abonaA^&ukumo wa<ixowa`nukumo wa>azowa`jukumo waEa$iyratukumo wa>amowa`lN {qotarafotumuwhaA watija`rapN taxo$awona kasaAdahaA wamasa`kinu taroDawonahaA^ >aHab~a <ilayokum m~ina {ll~ahi warasuwlihi. wajihaAdK fiY sabiylihi. fatarab~aSuwA@ Hat~aY` ya>otiYa {ll~ahu bi>amorihi. wa{ll~ahu laA yahodiY {loqawoma {lofa`siqiyna

laqado naSarakumu {ll~ahu fiY mawaATina kaviyrapK wayawoma HunayonK <i*o >aEojabatokumo kavoratukumo falamo tugoni Eankumo $ayo_#FA waDaAqato Ealayokumu {lo>aroDu bimaA raHubato vum~a wal~ayotum m~udobiriyna
vum~a >anzala {ll~ahu sakiynatahu, EalaY` rasuwlihi. waEalaY {lomu&ominiyna wa>anzala junuwdFA l~amo tarawohaA waEa*~aba {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ wa*a`lika jazaA^'u {loka`firiyna
vum~a yatuwbu {ll~ahu min[ baEodi *a`lika EalaY` man ya$aA^'u wa{ll~ahu gafuwrN r~aHiymN

ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ <in~amaA {lomu$orikuwna najasN falaA yaqorabuwA@ {lomasojida {loHaraAma baEoda EaAmihimo ha`*aA wa<ino xifotumo EayolapF fasawofa yugoniykumu {ll~ahu min faDolihi.^ <in $aA^'a <in~a {ll~aha EaliymN HakiymN

qa`tiluwA@ {l~a*iyna laA yu&ominuwna bi{ll~ahi walaA bi{loyawomi {lo'aAxiri walaA yuHar~imuwna maA Har~ama {ll~ahu warasuwluhu, walaA yadiynuwna diyna {loHaq~i mina {l~a*iyna >uwtuwA@ {lokita`ba Hat~aY` yuEoTuwA@ {lojizoyapa Ean yadK wahumo Sa`giruwna

{t~axa*uw^A@ >aHobaArahumo waruhoba`nahumo >arobaAbFA m~in duwni {ll~ahi wa{lomasiyHa {bona maroyama wamaA^ >umiruw^A@ <il~aA liyaEobuduw^A@ <ila`hFA wa`HidFA l~aA^ <ila`ha <il~aA huwa suboHa`nahu, Eam~aA yu$orikuwna

<il~aA tanSuruwhu faqado naSarahu {ll~ahu <i*o >axorajahu {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ vaAniYa {vonayoni <i*o humaA fiY {logaAri <i*o yaquwlu liSa`Hibihi. laA taHozano <in~a {ll~aha maEanaA fa>anzala {ll~ahu sakiynatahu, Ealayohi wa>ay~adahu, bijunuwdK l~amo tarawohaA wajaEala kalimapa {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ {ls~ufolaY` wakalimapu {ll~ahi hiYa {loEuloyaA wa{ll~ahu EaziyzN HakiymN

wamaA manaEahumo >an tuqobala minohumo nafaqa`tuhumo <il~aA^ >an~ahumo kafaruwA@ bi{ll~ahi wabirasuwlihi. walaA ya>otuwna {lS~alaw`pa <il~aA wahumo kusaAlaY` walaA yunfiquwna <il~aA wahumo ka`rihuwna

walawo >an~ahumo raDuwA@ maA^ 'aAtaY`humu {ll~ahu warasuwluhu, waqaAluwA@ HasobunaA {ll~ahu sayu&otiynaA {ll~ahu min faDolihi. warasuwluhu,^ <in~aA^ <ilaY {ll~ahi ra`gibuwna

<in~amaA {lS~adaqa`tu lilofuqaraA^'i wa{lomasa`kiyni wa{loEa`miliyna EalayohaA wa{lomu&al~afapi quluwbuhumo wafiY {lr~iqaAbi wa{loga`rimiyna wafiY sabiyli {ll~ahi wa{boni {ls~abiyli fariyDapF m~ina {ll~ahi wa{ll~ahu EaliymN HakiymN

waminohumu {l~a*iyna yu&o*uwna {ln~abiY~a wayaquwluwna huwa >u*unN qulo >u*unu xayorK l~akumo yu&ominu bi{ll~ahi wayu&ominu lilomu&ominiyna waraHomapN l~il~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ minkumo wa{l~a*iyna yu&o*uwna rasuwla {ll~ahi lahumo Ea*aAbN >aliymN

>alamo yaEolamuw^A@ >an~ahu, man yuHaAdidi {ll~aha warasuwlahu, fa>an~a lahu, naAra jahan~ama xa`lidFA fiyhaA *a`lika {loxizoYu {loEaZiymu
yaHo*aru {lomuna`fiquwna >an tunaz~ala Ealayohimo suwrapN tunab~i}uhum bimaA fiY quluwbihimo quli {sotahozi'uw^A@ <in~a {ll~aha muxorijN m~aA taHo*aruwna
wala}in sa>alotahumo layaquwlun~a <in~amaA kun~aA naxuwDu wanaloEabu qulo >abi{ll~ahi wa'aAya`tihi. warasuwlihi. kuntumo tasotahozi'uwna
laA taEota*iruwA@ qado kafarotum baEoda <iyma`nikumo <in n~aEofu Ean TaA^}ifapK m~inkumo nuEa*~ibo TaA^}ifapF[ bi>an~ahumo kaAnuwA@ mujorimiyna

{lomuna`fiquwna wa{lomuna`fiqa`tu baEoDuhum m~in[ baEoDK ya>omuruwna bi{lomunkari wayanohawona Eani {lomaEoruwfi wayaqobiDuwna >ayodiyahumo nasuwA@ {ll~aha fanasiyahumo <in~a {lomuna`fiqiyna humu {lofa`siquwna
waEada {ll~ahu {lomuna`fiqiyna wa{lomuna`fiqa`ti wa{lokuf~aAra naAra jahan~ama xa`lidiyna fiyhaA hiYa Hasobuhumo walaEanahumu {ll~ahu walahumo Ea*aAbN m~uqiymN

ka{l~a*iyna min qabolikumo kaAnuw^A@ >a$ad~a minkumo quw~apF wa>akovara >amowa`lFA wa>awola`dFA fa{sotamotaEuwA@ bixala`qihimo fa{sotamotaEotum bixala`qikumo kamaA {sotamotaEa {l~a*iyna min qabolikum bixala`qihimo waxuDotumo ka{l~a*iY xaADuw^A@ >uw@la`^}ika HabiTato >aEoma`luhumo fiY {ld~unoyaA wa{lo'aAxirapi wa>uw@la`^}ika humu {loxa`siruwna

>alamo ya>otihimo naba>u {l~a*iyna min qabolihimo qawomi nuwHK waEaAdK wavamuwda waqawomi <ibora`hiyma wa>aSoHa`bi madoyana wa{lomu&otafika`ti >atatohumo rusuluhum bi{lobay~ina`ti famaA kaAna {ll~ahu liyaZolimahumo wala`kin kaAnuw^A@ >anfusahumo yaZolimuwna

wa{lomu&ominuwna wa{lomu&omina`tu baEoDuhumo >awoliyaA^'u baEoDK ya>omuruwna bi{lomaEoruwfi wayanohawona Eani {lomunkari wayuqiymuwna {lS~alaw`pa wayu&otuwna {lz~akaw`pa wayuTiyEuwna {ll~aha warasuwlahu,^ >uw@la`^}ika sayaroHamuhumu {ll~ahu <in~a {ll~aha EaziyzN HakiymN

waEada {ll~ahu {lomu&ominiyna wa{lomu&omina`ti jan~a`tK tajoriY min taHotihaA {lo>anoha`ru xa`lidiyna fiyhaA wamasa`kina Tay~ibapF fiY jan~a`ti EadonK wariDowa`nN m~ina {ll~ahi >akobaru *a`lika huwa {lofawozu {loEaZiymu

yaHolifuwna bi{ll~ahi maA qaAluwA@ walaqado qaAluwA@ kalimapa {lokufori wakafaruwA@ baEoda <isola`mihimo waham~uwA@ bimaA lamo yanaAluwA@ wamaA naqamuw^A@ <il~aA^ >ano >agonaY`humu {ll~ahu warasuwluhu, min faDolihi. fa<in yatuwbuwA@ yaku xayorFA l~ahumo wa<in yatawal~awoA@ yuEa*~ibohumu {ll~ahu Ea*aAbFA >aliymFA fiY {ld~unoyaA wa{lo'aAxirapi wamaA lahumo fiY {lo>aroDi min waliY~K walaA naSiyrK

falam~aA^ 'aAtaY`hum m~in faDolihi. baxiluwA@ bihi. watawal~awA@ w~ahum m~uEoriDuwna
fa>aEoqabahumo nifaAqFA fiY quluwbihimo <ilaY` yawomi yaloqawonahu, bimaA^ >axolafuwA@ {ll~aha maA waEaduwhu wabimaA kaAnuwA@ yako*ibuwna
>alamo yaEolamuw^A@ >an~a {ll~aha yaEolamu sir~ahumo wanajowaY`humo wa>an~a {ll~aha Eal~a`mu {loguyuwbi
{l~a*iyna yalomizuwna {lomuT~aw~iEiyna mina {lomu&ominiyna fiY {lS~adaqa`ti wa{l~a*iyna laA yajiduwna <il~aA juhodahumo fayasoxaruwna minohumo saxira {ll~ahu minohumo walahumo Ea*aAbN >aliymN
